subject: Join the Anatrim revolution
body:
Get out of the obese crowd





Anatrim – The up-to-the-moment and most enchanting product for corpulent people is made available now – As were seen on CNN



Do you see redundant body kilos kill very much people around the whole world? We know you hate the ugly look of those people and the low status they have in modern society. 

Moreover, you have not the will to withstand an assault of terrible eating habits of yours. If it sounds familiar, then we got something to propose to you!





Here Anatrim comes, the ultimate product for the elimination of your body’s extra weight. The most astonishing thing is that Anatrim improves the quality of your life, repressing the feeling of hunger and giving you gay spirit. Look at some notes received from our customers:





"This is outstanding! 


Instead of stuffing myself with food and watching TV 


I became more interested in taking exercise.






 Anatrim made me take a step up.


 I have a great figure now and lots of men fix their eyes on me!"






Victoria K., Bellevue WA






"Passive weight burning was of no help to me. It was rather difficult for me to hold back and not to eat something just at hand. 


Once I heard on Anatrim in the media advertisement and I was really effected by the information.


 I had tried taking it, and my wife said that I’m not more a weighty man now, 5 months later. 


30 pounds have gone away and I keep losing them! 


And you know, I’m an impetuous lover again."






Rikky Martin, San Diego





Anatrim helps your brain to realize that you don't need that much food. It raises your mood up, supplies you with energy, and attacks useless kilos. Great thanks to its powerful original formula!!



Elicit latest intelligence!
